ParameterFields.Name: Type
ParameterFields.ToolTip: The behavior of the Bokoblin when it spawns.

ParameterFields.Name: Is Green
ParameterFields.ToolTip: If this is set, the Bokoblin is green. However, this is overriden by the Pink Bokoblin with Telescope type.

ParameterFields.Name: Weapon
ParameterFields.ToolTip:
The weapon that the Bokoblin is holding when it spawns.
Note: In the A_mori stage, Bokoblins will never spawn with a weapon regardless of what you set this parameter to.

ParameterFields.Name: Path
ParameterFields.ToolTip: The path that the Bokoblin follows.

ParameterFields.Name: Invert Spawn Condition Switch
ParameterFields.ToolTip:
If this is checked, the 'Spawn Condition Switch' parameter acts as a 'Disable Spawn Switch'.
If this isn't checked, the 'Spawn Condition Switch' parameter acts as an 'Enable Spawn Switch'.
